data.excerpt: State actions against drought May 10, 2021 Governor Gavin Newsom significantly expands his April 21 drought emergency proclamation to include Klamath River, Sacramento-San Joaquin Delta and Tulare Lake Watershed counties where accelerated action is needed to protect public health, safety and the environment. April 21, 2021 Governor Newsom issues an Emergency Proclamation to advance state drought preparation and response in the … Read more
